submission:
from collections import defaultdict
from bisect import bisect_left
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self,nums, k):
        changes = defaultdict(list)
        values = []

        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n - i - 1]
            diff = abs(a - b)
            maxx = max(a, b, k - a, k - b)

            changes[diff].append(maxx)
            values.append(maxx)

        values.sort()
        minn = n

        for diff, maxx in changes.items():
            index = bisect_left(values, diff)
            total_changes = index * 2 + (n // 2 - index)
            for max_val in maxx:
                if max_val < diff:
                    total_changes -= 2
                else:
                    total_changes -= 1
            minn = min(minn, total_changes)
        return minn
